mapper.sql: uuid, userName, password, name, sex, idNo, nation, birth, age, period, phone, marriage, height, weight, eyesight, bloodType, family_uuid
mapper.select: select uuid, userName, name, sex, idNo, phone from t_resident where idNo LIKE CONCAT('%', #{idNo},'%' )

select r.uuid, r.userName, r.name, r.sex, r.phone, r.idNo, f.number familyNumber from t_resident r, t_family f where 1=1
and r.userName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName},'%' )
and r.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name},'%' )
and r.sex LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sex},'%' )
and r.idNo LIKE CONCAT('%', #{idNo},'%' )
and f.number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{familyNumber},'%' )
and r.family_uuid = f.uuid
mapper.insert: insert into t_resident (uuid, userName, password, name, sex, idNo, nation, birth, age, period, phone, marriage, height, weight, eyesight, bloodType, family_uuid) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marriage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eyesight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bloodType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{family.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_resident
uuid,
userName,
password,
name,
sex,
idNo,
nation,
birth,
age,
period,
phone,
marriage,
height,
weight,
eyesight,
bloodType,
family_uuid,
#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update t_resident
userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
idNo = #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birth = #{birth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
period = #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
marriage = #{marriage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
height = #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eyesight = #{eyesight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bloodType = #{bloodType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
family_uuid = #{family.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_resident set userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, idNo = #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, period = #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marriage = #{marriage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, height = #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eyesight = #{eyesight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bloodType = #{bloodType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, family_uuid = #{family.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
